name: Melting Hearts
description:
Two hearts meet. They start spinning around each other getting closer and closer. The gravitational pull of their beating core leads them to an inevitable collision. Once they get passed a certain proximity, they melt into one another forming a super heart. It becomes almost impossible to escape the gravity of such a dense celestial object.

Once the union reaches the end of its life, it contracts and then explodes giving off enormous amounts of energy while creating many new emotions into the surrounding universe.

Digital Painting
1439x1439 pixels

2016
